entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 4 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 16 March 2023
